sense.gloss: firm-sided backpack made of leather, etc. (used by Japanese elementary schoolchildren, often red for girls and black for boys)

sdata.j: ↑最近↑↓さいきん↓の|ランドセル|の↑重↑↓おも↓さは、↑平均↑↓へいきん↓↑1.1kg↑↓いってんいちきろ↓。↑砂糖↑↓さとう↓↑一↑↓ひと↓↑袋↑↓ふくろ↓↑分↑↓ぶん↓の↑重↑↓おも↓さ↑程度↑↓ていど↓しかありません。
sdata.e: The average school bag currently weighs on average 1.1kg. Which is only about the weight of a bag of sugar.

sdata.j: ↑僕↑↓ぼく↓の|ランドセル|、めっちゃ↑重↑↓おも↓いんだ。
sdata.e: My schoolbag is heavy as hell.
